items.sentence: I've been having a lot of negative thoughts lately.
I can't speak French without making a few mistakes.
This is the first time that I've seen one of these.
I hope I'll be able to help you at some other time.
Tom has a driver's license, but hardly ever drives.
It has slowly dawned upon us that he will not help.
She had to part with her family when the war began.
Some people think talking back to an adult is rude.
The day will soon come when man can travel to Mars.
About how many customers came into your shop today?
